thread.title: 'Nashville' Cast Reacts to Devastating Twist With Heartfelt Tributes
thread.title_full: 'Nashville' Cast Reacts to Devastating Twist With Heartfelt Tributes

title: 'Nashville' Cast Reacts to Devastating Twist With Heartfelt Tributes
text:
'Nashville' Cast Reacts to Devastating Twist With Heartfelt Tributes February 24, 2017 @ 10:48 AM By Joyce Chen 
A city in mourning. The cast of Nashville reacted to the series‚Äô shocking Thursday, February 23, twist with an outpouring of heartfelt tributes on social media after the episode aired. Spoiler alert: Do not read on if you haven‚Äôt yet watched the heartrending hour! 
After undergoing intensive surgery for the injuries she sustained in last week‚Äôs car accident, Rayna Jaymes ( Connie Britton ) died peacefully in her hospital room surrounded by her husband, Deacon ( Charles Esten ), and daughters Maddie ( Lennon Stella ) and Daphne ( Maisy Stella ). Watch the heartbreaking moment in the clip above! 'Nashville' Jake Giles Netter/CMT Gone Too Soon! TV's 10 Most Shocking Deaths This Season 
Fans were understandably devastated about the loss of one of the show‚Äôs main characters ‚Äî and they weren‚Äôt alone. The tight-knit cast was impacted by Rayna‚Äôs death as well, and several of the show‚Äôs biggest names took to social media to express their gratitude toward Britton, 49, and bid adieu to the series‚Äô emotional core. The cast of 'Nashville' Bob D'Amico/ABC via Getty Images Country Music's Hottest Hunks 
‚ÄúI took this picture almost 5 years ago on my first day of shooting #nashville with @conniebritton,‚Äù Esten, 51, captioned a shot of the pair‚Äôs monogrammed chairs sitting side by side. ‚ÄúI was already a fan. Now, after all this time, she‚Äôs my friend. And I‚Äôm an even bigger fan. I‚Äôm grateful for every scene, and for every song, and wish her nothing but the very best. ‚ú® #deaconandrayna.‚Äù A post shared by Charles Esten (@charles_esten) on Feb 23, 2017 at 10:08pm PST A post shared by m a i s y (@maisystella) on Feb 23, 2017 at 7:23pm PST Nashies, we love you. G'night from under a pile of animals who've come & sat on me, either to stop me crying, or smother me. #NashvilleCMT üíú ‚Äî Clare Bowen (@clarembee) February 24, 2017 To our community of #Nashies ... I am grateful. You have shared pain and helped each other heal. You make our show special. ‚Äî Chris Carmack (@RealCarmack) February 24, 2017 My mascara is ruined.... #NashvilleCMT 10 Most Devastating TV Deaths of 2016 
Britton had her own message for her Nashville family and fans, which she shared in a touching post via Instagram. ‚ÄúThank you Rayna James. For your magic and your dignity. And thank you to all the creators of Rayna James, for there were many,‚Äù she wrote . ‚ÄúCallie Khouri, who gave her life. Deacon, Maddie, Daphne, who shaped her as her family. ‚Ä¶ But finally and most importantly, the fans. You made Rayna. You supported her and loved her and gave her inspiration just as she was able to inspire you. You were the energy source, the power behind her heart and soul and life. Rayna lived for you.‚Äù 
Fans of the hit country music-themed show were distraught after ABC dropped the series last May; CMT picked up the drama for its fifth season, which kicked off last December.
